verses.text: \w Now|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Aram \w assembled|strong="H6908"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w entire|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H2426"\w*. Accompanied \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w thirty-two|strong="H7970"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w marched|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w besieged|strong="H6696"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* waged \w war|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w into|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Ahab \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,

saying, “\w This|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w what|strong="H2896"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*:\f + \fr 20:3 \ft Some texts break verse 2 and begin verse 3 at this point.\f* ‘\w Your|strong="H3541"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* mine, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3541"\w* \w best|strong="H2896"\w* wives \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* mine!’”

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w Just|strong="H1697"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w say|strong="H1697"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* lord \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \w I|strong="H1697"\w* am yours, along \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w came|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said, “\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3701"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* demand \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w your|strong="H5414"\w* wives, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w search|strong="H2664"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w seize|strong="H3947"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w carry|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w precious|strong="H4261"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.’”

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w take|strong="H1121"\w* \w note|strong="H3045"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w man|strong="H2205"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w looking|strong="H1245"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w trouble|strong="H7451"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* demanded \w my|strong="H3605"\w* wives, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w deny|strong="H4513"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w*, “\w Do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* consent \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* terms.”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* Ahab \w answered|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w*, “\w Tell|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* lord \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, ‘\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* demanded \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w time|strong="H7223"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.’” \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* relayed \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w another|strong="H3254"\w* message \w to|strong="H7971"\w* Ahab: “\w May|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* gods \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* ever \w so|strong="H6213"\w* severely, if \w enough|strong="H3605"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* remains \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* handful.”

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w Tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H6030"\w*: ‘\w The|strong="H1696"\w* \w one|strong="H4428"\w* putting \w on|strong="H2296"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* armor \w should|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H1696"\w* \w boast|strong="H1984"\w* \w like|strong="H3478"\w* \w one|strong="H4428"\w* taking \w it|strong="H1696"\w* \w off|strong="H6605"\w*.’”

Ben-hadad \w received|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w while|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* \w tents|strong="H5521"\w*,\f + \fr 20:12 \ft Or in Succoth; also in verse 16\f* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, “\w Take|strong="H7760"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* positions.” \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w stationed|strong="H7760"\w* \w themselves|strong="H7760"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*. Ahab Defeats Ben-hadad

\w Meanwhile|strong="H3541"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w approached|strong="H5066"\w* Ahab \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w declared|strong="H3045"\w*, “\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w entire|strong="H3605"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w army|strong="H1995"\w*? \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w very|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.’”

“\w By|strong="H3068"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w*?” Ahab asked. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* prophet replied, “\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w By|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w officers|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* district \w governors|strong="H8269"\w*.’” “\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* start \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*?” asked Ahab. “\w You|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w*,” answered \w the|strong="H3541"\w* prophet.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* Ahab \w assembled|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w officers|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* district \w governors|strong="H8269"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* 232 \w men|strong="H5288"\w*. \w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H8147"\w*, \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembled|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rest|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelite|strong="H3478"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w*, 7,000 \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1931"\w* \w marched|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w noon|strong="H6672"\w* \w while|strong="H1931"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* 32 \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* allied \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w were|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H3318"\w* \w tents|strong="H5521"\w* getting \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w officers|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* district \w governors|strong="H8269"\w* \w marched|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w*. \w Now|strong="H5288"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \w had|strong="H8269"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* scouts, \w who|strong="H5288"\w* \w reported|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, “\w Men|strong="H5288"\w* \w are|strong="H8269"\w* marching \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.”

“If \w they|strong="H7965"\w* \w have|strong="H7965"\w* \w marched|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H4421"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3318"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w*, “\w take|strong="H8610"\w* \w them|strong="H8610"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*. Even if \w they|strong="H7965"\w* \w have|strong="H7965"\w* \w marched|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w for|strong="H3318"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, \w take|strong="H8610"\w* \w them|strong="H8610"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*.”

\w Meanwhile|strong="H3318"\w*, these \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w officers|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* district \w governors|strong="H8269"\w* \w marched|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w behind|strong="H4480"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3478"\w* each \w one|strong="H4428"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* opponent. \w So|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Arameans \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w pursuit|strong="H7291"\w*. \w But|strong="H5221"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Aram \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w horseback|strong="H5483"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cavalry|strong="H6571"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w marched|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w attacked|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, inflicting \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4347"\w* \w on|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* Arameans.

Afterward, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w approached|strong="H5066"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* said, “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* position, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w take|strong="H2388"\w* \w note|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H3478"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w spring|strong="H5927"\w* \f + \fr 20:22 \ft Literally at the turn of the year; similarly in verse 26\f* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Aram \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.”

Meanwhile, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Aram \w said|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w Their|strong="H1992"\w* gods \w are|strong="H1992"\w* gods \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hills|strong="H2022"\w*. \w That|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w why|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w prevailed|strong="H2388"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Instead|strong="H3808"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w should|strong="H5650"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w plains|strong="H4334"\w*; \w surely|strong="H3651"\w* \w then|strong="H3651"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w prevail|strong="H2388"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w*: Dismiss \w all|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* positions \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w replace|strong="H8478"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w other|strong="H2088"\w* \w officers|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6963"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w raise|strong="H8085"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w lost|strong="H5307"\w*—\w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w*—\w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w can|strong="H6213"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* Israelites \w on|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w plain|strong="H4334"\w*, \w where|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w surely|strong="H6213"\w* \w prevail|strong="H2388"\w*.” \w And|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* king approved \w their|strong="H8085"\w* plan \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w acted|strong="H6213"\w* \w accordingly|strong="H3651"\w*.
